faqs.question: Is pet insurance worth it for a Basset Hound?
faqs.answer: Yes. Bassets face chronic ear infections, back problems, and bloat risk. Insurance helps manage these predictable ongoing costs.

faqs.question: Why do Basset Hounds get ear infections?
faqs.answer: Their long, heavy ears trap moisture and limit airflow. Weekly cleaning helps but many Bassets still need regular veterinary ear treatment.

faqs.question: Do Basset Hounds have back problems?
faqs.answer: Yes—their long backs and short legs predispose them to IVDD. Avoid jumping and stairs. Keep them at healthy weight to reduce risk.

faqs.question: Are Bassets prone to bloat?
faqs.answer: Yes—their deep chest puts them at risk. Feed smaller meals, avoid exercise after eating, and know the symptoms.

faqs.question: How long do Basset Hounds live?
faqs.answer: 10-12 years typically. Managing weight is crucial—obese Bassets have more health problems and shorter lives.
